{"id":720959950,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1655095795,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"43 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/720959950/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int res = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < grid.size(); i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = 0; j < grid[0].size(); j++)\n            {\n                if(grid[i][j] == 1)\n                    res = std::max(areaOfIsland(grid, i, j), res);\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n    \n    int areaOfIsland(std::vector<std::vector<int>> &grid, int i, int j)\n    {\n        if( i >= 0 && i < grid.size() && j >= 0 && j < grid[0].size() && grid[i][j] == 1)\n        {\n            grid[i][j] = 0;\n            return 1 + areaOfIsland(grid, i+1, j) + areaOfIsland(grid, i-1,j) + areaOfIsland(grid, i, j+1) + areaOfIsland(grid, i, j-1);\n        }\n        return 0;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
